example.text: The levels of Clara cell secretory protein can be decreased in NLF from smokers, and it has also been found that NLF from smokers contained increased proportions of a truncated variant of lipocortin-1, threee acidic forms of alpha (1)-antitrypsin, and one phosphorylated form of cystatin S.Syntrophin binds to an alternatively spliced exon of dystrophin.
example.arg: levels of Clara cell secretory protein
